name: 黃馨瑩

schedule: 同課號137831：進階英文閱讀與聽講練習
materials:
1. Interactions 2 Listening/ Speaking by Judith Tanka/ Lida R. Baker (McGraw Hill)
Interactions 2 Reading by Pamela Hartmann/ Elaine Kirn (McGraw Hill)
2. Other Teacher-assigned material.
